abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the proposed project is
            to assist the Government of Brazil in establishing a policy
            for providing water supply and sanitation in rural areas,
            defining sector goals at the Federal and State levels, and
            institutional responsibilities. The national technical
            assistance component would finance: (a) studies of the
            organization of the sector and the reordering of
            institutions, financial policies, including a system of
            finance, tariffs and cost recovery; community promotion; and
            training requirements; (b) an inventory of technologies and
            technical standards; (c) the preparation of state investment
            plans; (d) special assistance to ten Northeast states for
            project preparation including implementing community
            participation programs; and (e) equipment. The component
            would also finance special assistance to the emergency water
            works included in the Northeast's Small Farmer Program
            (PAPP) to be financed by proposed rural development
            projects. The pilot project would support the above
            objectives by testing and evaluating the delivery of services.
